author: Christopher Nolan
message: I think Kotlin is my favorite programming language

author: Peter Jackson
message: Searching for alternatives to XML layouts...

author: Hayao Miyazaki
message:
"""Hey, take a look at Jetpack Compose, it's great!
|It's the Android's modern toolkit for building native UI.
|It simplifies and accelerates UI development on Android.
|Less code, powerful tools, and intuitive Kotlin APIs :)""".trim()

author: Alexey Balabanov
message: Writing Kotlin for UI seems so natural, Compose where have you been all my life?

author: Robert Zemeckis
message: Android Studio next version's name is Arctic Fox

message: I didn't know you can now run the emulator directly from Android Studio

author: Steven Spielberg
